text: Pontiac Grand Am was a mid-size car and later a compact car that was produced by Pontiac. The Grand Am had two separate three-year runs in the 1970s: from 1973 to 1975, and again from 1978 to 1980 . Production of the intermediate sized Grand Am ended in 1980 when it was replaced by the Pontiac 6000. Category:Pontiac automobiles
title: Pontiac Grand Am
